name: DurationTest
description: Unit tests for generating random durations within specified bounds using the BaseFaker class.

test_cases.name: testDurationSeconds
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a random duration in seconds within a specified upper bound.

test_cases.name: testDurationMinutes
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a random duration in minutes within a specified upper bound.

test_cases.name: testDurationHours
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a random duration in hours within a specified upper bound.

test_cases.name: testDurationDays
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a random duration in days within a specified upper bound.
